article.title: Cartesian
article.paragraph: Cartesianmeans of or relating to the French philosopherRen Descartes—from his Latinized nameCartesius. It may refer to:

list.listitem: Cartesian dualism, the philosophy of the distinction between mind and body developed byRen DescartesCartesianism, name given to the philosophy ofRen DescartesCartesianism#Notable CartesianistsCartesianists, followers of Cartesianism
Cartesian Meditations, a work by Edmund Husserl
Cartesian linguistics, a work by Noam Chomsky

article.heading: Mathematics

list.listitem: Cartesian closed category, a closed category in category theory
Cartesian coordinate system, modern rectangular coordinate system
Cartesian diagram, a construction in category theory
Cartesian geometry, now more commonly calledanalytic geometry
Fibred category#Cartesian morphisms and functorsCartesian morphism, formalisation ofpull-backoperation in category theory
Cartesian product, a direct product of two sets
Cartesian product of graphs, a binary operation on graphs
Cartesian tree, a binary tree in computer science
